SEARCH
Module org.example.scdpro2
Package org.example.scdpro2.business.models.BPackageDiagarm

Class PackageComponent

java.lang.Object
org.example.scdpro2.business.models.Diagram
org.example.scdpro2.business.models.BPackageDiagarm.PackageComponent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class PackageComponent extends Diagram implements Serializable
Represents a component within a package diagram in the system. A PackageComponent holds a collection of PackageClassComponent elements and manages its own unique identifier, name, and dimensions (width and height). It extends from the Diagram class and implements functionality specific to package diagrams.
See Also:

    • x

      public double x
      The X-coordinate of the package component. Used for positioning the component in the UI or rendering context.

  • Constructor Details

    • PackageComponent

      public PackageComponent(String name)
      Constructs a new PackageComponent with the specified name. A unique ID is generated for the component, and default values for width and height are set.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the package component.
